report.title: Occurrence images for a NatureSpot site
report.description: Lists the images uploaded for occurrences at a NatureSpot Wild Place.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM ( SELECT name, taxon, common, taxon_group, image_path, image_caption, date_start, date_end, date_type, month, geom, entered_sref, entered_sref_system, recorder, external_key, created_on, verified_on, record_status FROM naturespot.vw_occurrences_by_location WHERE name='#site_name#' AND ('#taxon_group#'='all' OR taxon_group='#taxon_group#') AND ('#month#'='0' OR month='#month#') AND image_path IS NOT NULL) foo AND record_status='V' #order_by#
report.field_sql:
name, taxon, common, coalesce(common || '
', '') || '' || taxon || '' as formatted_taxon, taxon_group, lower(replace(replace(image_path, '''', ''), '.', '')) as image_link, image_path, image_caption, date_start, date_end, date_type, month, geom, entered_sref, entered_sref_system, recorder, external_key

param.name: month
param.description: Month to filter records by (1-12) or 0 for all months

param.name: taxon_group
param.description: Exact name of the taxon group, or all
